description: This file defines a custom runtime exception class named SimpleBankingGlobalException within the finance.exception package, including Lombok annotations for boilerplate code reduction.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom unchecked exception class for global error handling in the banking application, with fields for error code and message.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a message, calling the superclass constructor.
